name: ShootWest
description:
Saddle up, cowboys! This new arcade-style pixel shooter is taking you straight to the Wild West. You'll be dodging horses, spears, and bullets as you blast your way through waves of pesky Indians. The sound effects and background music will transport you to the true wildness of the desert. And with a scoring system that's easy to pick up but hard to master, you'll be coming back for more showdowns. So grab your hat, cock your gun, and let's mosey on down to some rootin' tootin' fun!

Basic Controls:

-"wasd" to move the player

-"space" shoot bullets

-press the "p" button to pause the game (also to see the highscore)

-"space" to restart the game

GamePlay:

-Rank up your score by shootin' down enemies . (+ 10 points for each indian)

-Dodge the horses and spears to avoid taking damage

-Pay attention the enemies are getting faster as time passes!

Note:

This game is highly in development and it's considered as an open project. This means that currently only one person is working on it every bit of advice, suggestion, and even the smallest amount of donation will make it possible to develop it, debug it and make the gameplay more exciting and immersive. Be a part of the Wild West shooting experience and help make it the best game it can be!

Feel free to contact me: builderstar.cube@gmail.com
